package org.mule.transport.legstar.test.jvmquery;
import com.legstar.coxb.transform.HostTransformException;
import org.mule.transport.legstar.transformer.AbstractXmlToHostMuleTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.jvmquery.bind.JvmQueryRequestXmlTransformers;

/**
 * XML to Host Byte Array Mule Transformer for JVMQueryRequest type.
 * <p/>
 * <code>JvmQueryRequestXmlToHostMuleTransformer</code> takes an XML as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC), ready
 * to be sent to a target Mainframe.
 * <p/> 
 * Class generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class JvmQueryRequestXmlToHostMuleTransformer extends AbstractXmlToHostMuleTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer.
     * @throws HostTransformException if transformer cannot be created
     */
    public JvmQueryRequestXmlToHostMuleTransformer() throws HostTransformException {
        super(new JvmQueryRequestXmlTransformers());
    }
}
